el:protected.el:luamain:
levelw = 39 levelh = 25
create_world(levelw, levelh) oxyd_default_flavor = "b" set_actor("ac-blackball", 14.5,5.5)
fill_floor("fl-abyss",0,0,levelw,levelh)
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c == "#" then set_floor("fl-normal", i-1,line) elseif c=="I" then set_floor("fl-ice_001", i-1,line) elseif c=="L" then set_item("it-extralife",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-normal", i-1,line) elseif c=="1" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=3}) elseif c=="2" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=4}) elseif c=="3" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=1}) elseif c=="4" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=2}) elseif c=="5" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=5}) elseif c=="6" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=6}) elseif c=="7" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=7}) elseif c=="8" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=8}) elseif c=="a" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=12}) elseif c=="b" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=10}) elseif c=="c" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=11}) elseif c=="d" then set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=9}) elseif c=="O" then oxyd(i-1,line) end end end -- 012345678901234567890123456789012345678 renderLine(00 , " ") renderLine(01 , " ") renderLine(02 , " O333333333336 53333336 ") renderLine(03 , " 1###########2 1###O##2 ") renderLine(04 , " 1#a4444444b#c6IIIII5336 1#a44b#2 ") renderLine(05 , " 1#2 1##2IIOII1##2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(06 , " 1#2 7448IIIII7b#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(07 , " 1#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(08 , " 1#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(09 , " 1#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(10 , " 1#c33333333333336 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(11 , " 1###############2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(12 , " 1#a44444444444b#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(13 , " 1#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(14 , " 1#2 5333d#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(15 , " 1#2 1#####2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(16 , " 1#2 1#a4448 1#c3333d#2 1#2 ") renderLine(17 , " 1#2 1#2 1L###O###2 1#2 ") renderLine(18 , " 1#2 1#2 1#a4444448 1#2 ") renderLine(19 , " 1#2 1#2 1#2 1#2 ") renderLine(20 , " 1#c3333333d#2 1#c333333333d#2 ") renderLine(21 , " 1##########O2 1#############2 ") renderLine(22 , " 7444444444448 74444444444444O ") renderLine(23 , " ") renderLine(24 , " ") -- 012345678901234567890123456789012345678
